0:
kubectl get pods \
  --all-namespaces \
  -o go-template \
  --template='{{range .items}}{{printf "%s %s %s\n" .metadata.namespace .metadata.name .status.message}}{{end}}' \
  | grep "Pod was terminated in response to imminent node shutdown." \
  | awk '{print $1, $2}' \
  | xargs -r -n2 kubectl delete pod -n || true

mkdir -p /data/snapshots
export VAULT_TOKEN=$(vault write -format=json auth/approle/login role_id=$APPROLE_ROLE_ID secret_id=$APPROLE_SECRET_ID | awk -F'"' '/client_token/{print $4}')
vault operator raft snapshot save /data/snapshots/openbao-raft.snap
ls -l /data/snapshots

until [ -f /data/snapshots/openbao-raft.snap ]; do sleep 5; done
gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=/data/credentials/credentials.json
gsutil cp /data/snapshots/openbao-raft.snap gs://$BUCKET_NAME/openbao_raft_$(date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M%S").snap
Govee to MQTT bridge for Home Assistant

if [ ! -f /data/config.json ]; then
  cp /config/config.json /data/config.json
fi
if [ ! -f /data/ring-state.json ]; then
  cp /config/ring-state.json /data/ring-state.json
fi
Web UI frontend for your scanner

cp /config/cookies.txt /config/cookies-rw.txt
ytdl-sub --log-level=debug --config=/config/config.yaml sub /media/youtube/subscriptions.yaml
echo "[cronjob:command] Fixing permissions, started at $$(date --rfc-2822)"
find $${MEDIA_FOLDER} -user root -exec chown 568:568 "{}" \; -exec chmod 777 "{}" \;
echo "[cronjob:command] Fixed permissions, ended at $$(date --rfc-2822)"

mariadb-dump -h go-discord-archiver-db --password="$(MARIADB_PROD_ROOT_PASSWORD)" go_archiver > /backup/dump.sql && \
while [[ $(mariadb -uroot --password="$${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}" "$${MARIADB_DATABASE}" < /backup/dump.sql; echo $?) != 0 ]]; do
  sleep 1
done &
exec docker-entrypoint.sh mariadbd
